mapper.select: SELECT P.*, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM PRODUCTS P, (select @ROWNUM := 0) A ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS (PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, SUPPLIER_ID, CATEGORY_ID, UNIT, PRICE, PHOTO) VALUES (#{productId}, #{productName}, #{supplierId}, #{categoryId}, #{unit}, #{price}, #{photo})
mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 COLOR,P.PRODUCT_NAME productName ,S.SUPPLIER_NAME supplierID,P.UNIT,P.PRICE FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN SUPPLIERS S ON P.SUPPLIER_ID LIKE S.SUPPLIER_ID ,(SELECT @ROWNUM:=0)TMP WHERE P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%${search}%' OR S.SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE '%${search}%' OR S.ADDRESS LIKE '%${search}%' OR S.CITY LIKE '%${search}%' limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN SUPPLIERS S ON P.SUPPLIER_ID LIKE S.SUPPLIER_ID WHERE P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%${value}%' OR S.SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE '%${value}%' OR S.ADDRESS LIKE '%${value}%' OR S.CITY LIKE '%${value}%'
